results.title: Gastrointestinal bleeding and possible hypothyroidism.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was initially placed on @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, and then @CHEMICAL_Amiodarone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000638 @@@amiodarone@@@ was added.
